title: Has Alesha Dixon had her baby after revealing pregnancy on BGT?
text:
Alesha Dixon has sparked speculation she may have given birth after sporting a noticeable baby bump throughout Britain’s Got Talent: The Champions (Picture: ITV)

Alesha Dixon has kept everybody guessing as to when she is due to welcome her second child, sporting a baby bump all the way through Britain’s Got Talent: The Champions.

And the final of the show is no exception, with the 40-year-old still heavily pregnant in the climactic show due to air on Saturday night.

We’ve been left to wonder when her new arrival is due ever since news of her pregnancy was revealed during the first live BGT semi-final earlier this year – and now there’s speculation that she might have already given birth ahead of filming for the next series of America’s Got Talent.

So has Alesha secretly welcomed her second child and kept shtum about it? Here’s what we know…

Has Alesha Dixon given birth?

Alesha has yet to confirm whether or not she has had her baby.

Alesha’s pregnancy was first revealed during the BGT live shows (Picture: Rex Shutterstock)

However she has sparked rumours that she’s given birth after she was spotted en route to auditions for the next series of America’s Got Talent in LA.

Alesha, who is taking over from Mel B on the panel, was snapped wearing a black crop top and holding a denim jacket over her midriff – with no sign of the baby bump she has had all through Britain’s Got Talent: The Champions.

All of which suggests that she has indeed brought her new little one into the world, although she has yet to confirm a date of birth or gender.

The baby is a brother or sister for her five-year-old daughter Azura Sienna, and her second child with her partner, dancer and model Azuka Ononye.

The couple have been together for over 10 years and are rumoured to have got married in 2017, although they have never confirmed this news, choosing instead to keep it private.

How was Alesha Dixon’s pregnancy revealed?

Alesha and her partner Azuka Ononye have been together for 10 years (Picture: Getty Images)

Alesha’s pregnancy was revealed during the opening musical number from Ant and Dec during the Britain’s Got Talent live finals – during which they sang the lyrics ‘Alesha is expecting’.

It came after she admitted in 2018 that she feared she was ‘too old’ to have another baby.

‘I don’t know whether it will happen given my age but I adore the idea of a large family and I hope I will be lucky,’ she told You magazine at the time.

‘The love I feel for Azura is so pure and unconditional. The main thing is to enjoy her in the present and be philosophical about the future, because what will be will be.’

Britain’s Got Talent: The Champions final is on ITV on Saturday night from 8.30pm.
description: Alesha Dixon has sparked rumours that she has given birth ahead of the final of Britain's Got Talent: The Champions airing.
